home_improvements.title: Clear roof and gutters of debris
home_improvements.description: Remove leaves, pine needles, and other flammable debris from the roof and gutters.

home_improvements.title: Install gutter guards
home_improvements.description: Install guards to prevent leaves and debris from clogging gutters.

home_improvements.title: Extend gutter downspouts away from the house
home_improvements.description: Extend downspouts to carry roof water at least 5-10 feet from the foundation.

home_improvements.title: Install non-combustible siding
home_improvements.description: Use materials like fiber cement, brick, or stucco for siding.

home_improvements.title: Use Class A fire-rated or Class 4 impact-resistant roofing
home_improvements.description: Install roofing materials designed to withstand fires or large hail.

home_improvements.title: Use non-combustible fencing within five feet of the home
home_improvements.description: Use fences from non-combustible materials like metal or vinyl.

home_improvements.title: Reinforce the garage door
home_improvements.description: Install a vertical bracing system or a wind-rated garage door.

home_improvements.title: Trim tree branches and shrubs around the house
home_improvements.description: Remove large or dead tree branches and shrubs from around the house.

home_improvements.title: Seal exterior wall openings
home_improvements.description: Caulk around windows, doors, and utility entry points.

home_improvements.title: Grade the landscape to slope away from the foundation
home_improvements.description: Slope the ground away from the house to direct rainwater away.

home_improvements.title: Apply waterproof sealant to foundation walls
home_improvements.description: Coat the exterior of the foundation with a waterproof sealant.

home_improvements.title: Reinforce the chimney
home_improvements.description: Brace an unreinforced masonry chimney with steel to prevent it from collapsing.

home_improvements.title: Insulate exposed exterior pipes
home_improvements.description: Wrap exterior faucets and water pipes with insulation.

home_improvements.title: Create a non-flammable (e.g. gravel or stone) barrier around the foundation
home_improvements.description: Place a one- to two-foot-wide barrier of gravel or stone around the foundation.

home_improvements.title: Reinforce Roof-to-Wall Connections
home_improvements.description: Strengthen roof-to-wall connections with hurricane straps and clips.

rubrics.title: Clear roof and gutters of debris

rubric.low: Lots of debris present on the roof or in the gutters
rubric.medium: Some debris present on the roof or in the gutters
rubric.high: No debris present on the roof or in the gutters

rubric.medium: Some gutter guards installed (or unclear if guards are installed)

rubrics.title: Extend gutter downspouts away from the house

rubric.low: Downspouts discharge near to the foundation
rubric.medium: Downspouts extend 2-4 feet from the foundation
rubric.high: Downspouts extend 5-10 feet from the foundation

rubric.medium: Mixed materials or partial non-combustible siding (fiber cement, brick, stucco, etc.)
rubric.high: Fully non-combustible siding installed (fiber cement, brick, stucco, etc.)

rubrics.title: Use Class A fire-rated or Class 4 impact-resistant roofing
Use non-combustible fencing within five feet of the home

rubric.low: Combustible fencing within 2-3 feet of the house
rubric.medium: Mixed fencing materials within 3-5 feet of the house
rubric.high: No fencing or non-combustible fencing within 5 feet of the house

rubric.low: Garage door appears to be unreinforced or in poor condition
rubric.medium: Garage door appears to be partially reinforced (or unclear) and in good condition
rubric.high: Garage door appears to be fully reinforced and in excellent condition

rubrics.title: Trim tree branches and shrubs around the house

rubric.low: Overhanging or dead branches and/or shrubs close to the house
rubric.medium: Most branches and shrubs are trimmed or removed
rubric.high: Close to no branches or shrubs within 5 feet of the house

rubric.low: Apparent gaps around multiple openings (windows, doors, etc.)
rubric.medium: Most openings appear to be sealed
rubric.high: All openings appear to be sealed

rubrics.title: Grade the landscape to slope away from the foundation

rubric.medium: Ground slopes away from the foundation
rubric.high: Ground slopes away from the foundation and has a 6-inch drop over 10 feet

rubrics.title: Apply waterproof sealant to foundation walls

rubric.low: No waterproof sealant applied or deteriorated covering
rubric.medium: Partial application or aging sealant showing wear
rubric.high: Complete coverage with high-quality waterproof sealant and proper drainage

rubric.low: Chimney appears to be unreinforced or in poor condition
rubric.medium: Chimney appears to be partially reinforced (or unclear) and in good condition
rubric.high: Chimney appears to be fully reinforced (or no chiminey is present) and in excellent condition

rubric.low: Exposed pipes with no insulation or deteriorated covering
rubric.medium: Basic foam covers on some pipes but incomplete coverage
rubric.high: All exterior pipes properly insulated with weather-resistant materials

rubrics.title: Create a non-flammable (e.g. gravel or stone) barrier around the foundation

rubric.low: No gravel or stone barrier around the foundation
rubric.medium: Partial barrier or inadequate width (less than 18-24 inches)
rubric.high: Complete 18-24 inch wide barrier of non-flammable material

rubric.low: Roof-to-wall connections are not reinforced or in poor condition
rubric.medium: Roof-to-wall connections are partially reinforced (or unclear) and in good condition
rubric.high: Roof-to-wall connections are fully reinforced and in excellent condition
